ezvcard.io
Class HCardPage

java.lang.Object
  ezvcard.io.HCardPage

public class HCardPage
extends Object

Writes vCards to an HTML page (hCard format).

Author:
Michael Angstadt
See Also:
http://microformats.org/wiki/hcard
